posts.post_content:
If you won the Matty Dark Cap in Huggins auction last night, and are open to moving it, please PM me. 
The SC 460/42 No OP is the last SC I need for my back run. I can trade a different SGC 1.5 Matty, cash, or other options. 

Or if you’re reading this and you have the back mentioned above (or an EPDG), please let me know! I’m sure we can work SOMETHING out. 

Thanks!!


Sent from my iPhone using Tapatalk
